author: palmtree5
TrustyJAID
description: Gets the latest Tweet from twitter accounts and posts them in the specified channels
install_msg: [p]tweets to see commands. Make sure to do pip3 install tweepy before using this plugin. Do [p]tweetset to find commands for setting consumer key and secret and access token and secret. If you need these, visit https://apps.twitter.com/ and create an application. This plugin only needs read only permissions as it will only read public information
name: Tweets
short: Cog for getting info from Twitter
